name: Liz Beal
title: Co-Founder, Social Media Coordinator
bio: Liz is a graduate of the University of Pittsburgh, where she studied Developmental Psychology and Elementary Education. She is currently a Fifth Grade teacher in the DC area.

name: Shi Johnson-Bey
title: Co-founder, Software Developer
favoriteFoods: French Fries, Fish Tacos, and Mangos
bio: Shi is a graduate of the University of Delaware and Carnegie Mellon University, where he studied Computer Science and Biomedical Engineering, respectively. He is currently a Ph.D. student researching autonomous character AI tools at UC Santa Cruz.
